snippet: Charlotte Olympia opens on the Upper East Side; Rag & Bone adds a store there, too; in East Hampton, Everything But Water is ready for beach season.
lead_paragraph: OPENINGS The film noirish footwear label CHARLOTTE OLYMPIA has arrived from London, setting up its first free-standing United States store on the Upper East Side. With prices that range from $595 for flats to more than $2,000 for sumptuous evening shoes, it is not surprising that Charlotte Dellal's designs have a following among red-carpet denizens like Beyoncé and Sarah Jessica Parker. In addition to its Sirens collection of about 30 ultrafeminine styles and several exclusive designs, the shop, at 22 East 65th Street, (212) 744-1892, stocks the label's jewelry, evening bags and hosiery.
